parameters.name: TopN
parameters.description:
Number of rows to keep from sorted index list.
Default = 4
e.g., If N = 4 (the default) the rows with the top 4 values will be kept.   (Note - data sorted by column specfied in SortMode)

parameters.name: SortMode
parameters.description: Can be Base, Target or Index.  Default = Index

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description:
Specifies which thresholds (if any) to apply
B = Base
T = Target
I = Index
ALL = Base, target and Index
Any combination of BTI is allowed.
Default = BTI

parameters.name: IndexMin
parameters.description:
Optional. Minimum Index threshold if filtering index values (see Mode for details).
Default = -1 (no threshold)

parameters.name: IndexMax
parameters.description:
Optional. Maximum Index threshold if filtering index values (see Mode for details).
Default = -1 (no threshold)

parameters.name: BaseMin
parameters.description:
Optional. Minimum Base threshold if filtering Base values (see Mode for details).
Default = -1 (no threshold)

parameters.name: BaseMax
parameters.description:
Optional. Maximum Index threshold if filtering Base values (see Mode for details).
Default = -1 (no threshold)

parameters.name: TargetMin
parameters.description:
Optional. Minimum Target threshold if filtering target values (see Mode for details).
Default = -1 (no threshold)

parameters.name: TargetMax
parameters.description:
Optional. Minimum Target threshold if filtering target values (see Mode for details).
Default = -1 (no threshold)
